snippet.title: Mad Experiments Escape Room Chapter 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Chapter 2 is now available for free!
Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1201550/Mad_Experiments_Escape_Room/
2-pack with 10% off on Humble Store: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/mad-experiments-escape-room-2-pack

Mad Experiments: Escape Room is a multiplayer escape game. You have 60 minutes to escape with your team of up to 6 players.
Available on PC, Mac and Linux.
https://www.playtogether-studio.com
